name: FinTel Communications
description:
FinTel Communications opened for business in 2008 to help minimize the pain the companies find when trying to contract with technology firms. Utilizing relationships that we have built and nurtured over the past 20 years with companies that survived the “dot bomb” era and / or are successfully providing services to happy clients, we connected our customers with them for their technology expertise.
As our client base grew and we were able to bring some services “in-house”, we focus on a few strong points that our customers were really in need of. Keeping it simple for our clients is the most important goal of FinTel Communications.
FinTel Communications continues to assist our customers with communications to keep them in front of their clients and prospects in a professional and pleasing manner.  A sample of websites that we have designed are on our Portfolio, please take a few minutes to review some of our many successes.
